metadata.description: This ruleset provides analysis of Maven built applications that depends on Thorntail Fractions, which should be replaced by the related Eclipse MicroProfile and/or Jakarta EE artifacts, when migrating to JBoss EAP XP.

hint.title: Replace Thorntail Fractions - io.thorntail:bean-validation
hint.message: If you migrate your application to JBoss EAP XP 2.0 (or later), and want to ensure its Maven building, running or testing works as expected, replace Thorntail Fraction `io.thorntail:bean-validation` with the related Eclipse MicroProfile and/or Jakarta EE artifacts.

link.title: Red Hat JBoss EAP XP Migration Guide: Thorntail Application Maven Project Migration
